name: The Chronicles of King Arthur - Episode 1: Excalibur
description: Play this thrilling match-3 game with 74 challenging levels and help the young king Arthur conquer the throne and reign over Britannia.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz CPU Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X compatible Soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz CPU Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X compatible Soundcard
